title: Duplicate Emails
markdown:
# **Duplicate Emails**

**Difficulty:** Easy  •  **Tags:** `GROUP BY` • `HAVING` • `COUNT`



## **Problem Description**

Write a SQL query to find all duplicate emails in the `contacts` table.



## **Table Schema**

**contacts**
```
+--------+------+
| Column | Type |
+--------+------+
| id     | INT  |
| email  | TEXT |
+--------+------+
```



## **Example**

### **Input**

**contacts**
```
+----+------------+
| id | email      |
+----+------------+
| 1  | a@test.com |
| 2  | b@test.com |
| 3  | a@test.com |
+----+------------+
```

### **Expected Output**

```
+------------+
| email      |
+------------+
| a@test.com |
+------------+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE contacts(id INT, email TEXT); INSERT INTO contacts VALUES (1,'a@test.com'),(2,'b@test.com'),(3,'a@test.com');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT email FROM contacts GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(email) > 1;

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE contacts(id INT, email TEXT);
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT email FROM contacts GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(email) > 1;

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE contacts(id INT, email TEXT); INSERT INTO contacts VALUES (1,'a@test.com'),(2,'b@test.com'),(3,'a@test.com');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT email FROM contacts GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(email) > 1;
